page.title: 13Adbolton Hall 2
page.content: There are 44 elderly people who live at{Adbolton Hall.}Most of them come from the Nottingham area but some are from as far afield as Scotland and Wales. To enter, the old people either have to have a lot of money or be unable to look after themselves and need nursing most of the time. It costs Â£180 a week to live there. Sometimes people have to wait up to six months before there is a vacancy for them. Altogether there are 81 people employed at Adbolton Hall including the Matron, secretary, four cleaners, five State Registered Nurses, three cooks, two kitchen assistants, two maintainance men and nursing staff. The old people do not get out very much but do have special celebrations for birthdays and on bonfire night.
